spells.name: Cloak of Chaos
spells.description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against lawful spells.

spells.name: Create Greater Undead
spells.description: Create shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.

spells.name: Dimensional Lock
spells.description: Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

spells.name: Discern Location
spells.description: Reveals exact location of creature or object.

spells.name: Holy Aura
spells.description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells.

spells.name: Planar Ally, Greater
spells.description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.

spells.name: Shield of Law
spells.description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

spells.name: Spell Immunity, Greater
spells.description: As spell immunity, but up to 8th-level spells.

spells.name: Summon Monster VIII
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Symbol of Insanity
spells.description: Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

spells.name: Unholy Aura
spells.description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against good spells.
